location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Translation of a letter from Abdollah ben Abdoolazeez [Abdullah bin Su'ud], Chief of the Wahabee [Wahabi] to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The first word on each line of the third, fourth and fith paragraphs of text have been obscured owing to insect damage.

mods.abstract: The letter is requesting clarification of the treaty between the 'English and Muslims', as he believes the English intend to extend it to peoples that are enemies of the Wahabee [Wahabi].The letter was translated by Robert Taylor.
